did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.physdesc: This collection consists of five preliminary drafts of his novel The Light Possessed (formerly called The Rose in the Skull).

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Additional Papers Of Alan Cheuse, Accession #10726-k, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Alan Cheuse of Fairfax, Virginia, placed his papers on loan to the Library on November 10, 1992. The papers were purchased by the Library on September 11, 2003.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the papers of Alan Cheuse consists of five preliminary drafts of his novel The Light Possessed (formerly called The Rose in the Skull), 1989-1990, all containing corrections and changes in the text by the author and his editor. Also present is a folder of notes and suggestions (23 items) made by several different readers concerning The Light Possessedbefore publication.
